document_data.name: Sylvan
document_data.mainbody: '''Sylvan''' was the language of the [[fey]]. Its written form used the [[Espruar]] alphabet.

Dictionary.G:
;groef
:Title of a [[grig]] prince in a local dialect of the [[High Forest]]; for example, Groef [[Feythrin]].<ref>
Dictionary.H:
;hurbryn
:"heavy-footed ones". Used to refer to [[humans]], especially by [[brownie]]s, [[korred]]s and [[satyr]]s.{{Cite polyhedron/74/The Everwinking Eye: Words To The Wise}}

;hykyath ({{Pronounce|Hik|ah|YATH|refs=}})
:"Prance!"—A parting used by [[satyr]]s.
